Recalculate Policy Trees with Flipped Double Robust Scores

Source: R/margot_flip_forests.R
margot_recalculate_policy_trees.Rd

This function recalculates policy trees using flipped double robust scores for outcomes that were processed by margot_flip_forests.

Usage

margot_recalculate_policy_trees(
  model_results,
  outcomes_to_recalculate = NULL,
  model_prefix = "model_",
  verbose = TRUE
)

Arguments

model_results

A list containing the model results after running margot_flip_forests().

outcomes_to_recalculate

A character vector of outcome names to recalculate policy trees for. If NULL, recalculates all outcomes marked as needing recalculation.

model_prefix

A character string indicating the prefix used for model names. Default is "model_".

verbose

Logical indicating whether to display detailed messages. Default is TRUE.

Value

An updated copy of model_results with recalculated policy trees.
